billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO MENTAL HEALTH AND DEVELOPMENTAL DISABILITIES

title: Provides guidelines and aids in locating sites for community residential facilities
summary: Provides guidelines and aides in locating sites for community residential facilities; requires OMRDD to conduct study on location of proposed sites.
